mapper.insert: insert into lost (title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, lostfoundtype_id, user_id) VALUES (#{lost.title}, #{lost.img}, #{lost.pub_date}, #{lost.content}, #{lost.place}, #{lost.phone}, #{lost.state}, #{lost.stick}, #{lost.lostfoundtypeId}, #{lost.user_id})
mapper.select: select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id from lost where lostfoundtype_id = #{lostfoundtypeId} and state = '未找到' order by pub_date desc
select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id from lost where user_id = #{user_id} order by pub_date desc
select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id from lost where state = '未找到'
select id, title, img, pub_date, content, place, phone, state, stick, user_id, lostfoundtype_id from lost where stick = #{stick} and state = '未找到'
